DOC.brief_title: Effect Rewarming Rate During Cardiopulmonary Bypass Clinical Prognosis Infants Undergoing Cardiac Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: There many study indicate rewarming management play important role cardiac surgery . The purpose study investigate relationship rewarming rate cardiopulmonary bypass clinical prognosis patient undergoing cardiac surgery . Infants undergo cardiac surgery cardiopulmonary bypass randomly assign either slow rewarming strategy ( 0.24 degree C/min ) fast rewarming strategy ( 0.5 degree C/min ) .
DOC.criteria: Infants underwent cardiac surgery cardiopulmonary bypass Preoperative liver kidney disease dysfunction Preoperative coagulation disorder Palliative operation second operation Above 3 year
